Food counter attendant job - CALGARY - Calpan Two Investments O/a Panago
Food counter attendant (Expired) Calpan Two Investments O/a Panago CALGARY Food counter attendant ( NOC: 6641 ) Terms of Employment: Permanent, Full Time, Day, Evening Salary: $11.00 to $13.00 Hourly for 40 hours per week Anticipated Start Date: As soon as possible Location: Calgary South West, Alberta (3 vacancies ) Skill Requirements: Education: Not required Credentials (certificates, licences, memberships, courses, etc.): Not required Experience: No experience Languages: Speak English, Read English Type of Equipment: Grill Work Setting: Fast food Counter Attendant and Food Preparer Skills: Take customers' orders, Prepare, heat and finish simple food items, Serve customers at counters or buffet tables, Use manual and electrical appliances to clean, peel, slice and trim foodstuffs, Portion and wrap foods, Package take-out food, Stock refrigerators and salad bars, Keep records of the quantities of food used Weight Handling: Up to 9 kg (20 lbs) Essential Skills: Decision making, Continuous learning Employer: Calpan - Two Investments ltd O/a Panago How to Apply: Please apply for this job only in the manner specified by the employer. Failure to do so may result in your application not being properly considered for the position. In Person between 9:00 and 17:.... Found at Jobbank on 2011-10-09 00:14:35
